attributes.action: Ghurkas should have the same rights as British Citizens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These brave individuals who have service Great Britain through various dangerous campaigns are being treated dreadfully.  We treat illegal immigrants better.  Shame on the Government now and in the past

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Gurkha-soldiers/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
